import React from 'react' import './Toggle.css' import Sun from '@iconscout/react-unicons/icons/uil-sun' import Moon from '@iconscout/react-unicons/icons/uil-moon' import { themeContext } from '../../ModeContext' import { useContext } from 'react' const Toggle = () => { const theme = useContext(themeContext) const darkMode=theme.state.darkMode return (
) } export default Toggle
